abstract: Assailants fatally shoot pro-government militia leader Ahmed al-Idrisi and five others in Aden, Yemen, hours after militia handed over city's strategic port to government; in Taiz, Yemen, hospital officials report attack that has injured at least 20 staff members.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Assailants Kill a Militia Leader
headline.main: Yemen: Assailants Kill a Militia Leader

snippet: The leader and five of his companions were killed in a drive-by shooting just hours after he had handed over control of a strategic port to government troops.
lead_paragraph: The leader and five of his companions were killed in a drive-by shooting just hours after he had handed over control of a strategic port to government troops.
